EmailTemplate.description: This template will be used in the store visit summary email
EmailTemplate.name: 3PL Rep Review Summary
EmailTemplate.subject: 3PL Manager Review Summary
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
While reviewing: {!Store_Activity__c.What_did_you_review_with_the_employees3P__c} with the 3PL Rep, {!Store_Activity__c.Who_did_you_meet_with_for_email__c}, the following things were observed:
<checkbox:{!Store_Activity__c.Rep_not_present_at_designated_time__c}>Rep not present at designated time? <checkbox:{!Store_Activity__c.Rep_not_wearing_appropriate_attire__c}>Rep not wearing appropriate attire? <checkbox:{!Store_Activity__c.Rep_lacks_tablet_to_sell_service__c}>Rep lacks tablet to sell service? <checkbox:{!Store_Activity__c.Rep_tablet_lacks_3G_coverage__c}>Rep's tablet lacks 3G coverage?
